public Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.ResourceCollection<Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Invoices.Invoice> Query (Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Query.IQuery query);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.ResourceCollection`1<class Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Invoices.Invoice> Query(class Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Query.IQuery query) cil managed
Public Function Query (query As IQuery) As ResourceCollection(Of Invoice)

Docs.param: The invoice query. The can be used to build queries. Invoice queries support simple and indexed queries. You can retrieve subsets of invoices by providing an indexed query and specifying the index to start from and the page size to retrieve. You can also filter invoices using their dates. lists the supported search fields. You can use the enumeration to specify filtering operations. Supported filtering operations are: greater than, greater than or equals, less than, less than or equals, equals, and not equals. You can also compose compound filters that use the AND and OR field filter operations to retrieve a specific invoice subset.
Docs.summary: Queries invoices associated to the partner.
Docs.returns: The invoices that match the given query.

Docs.param: The invoice query. The can be used to build queries. Invoice queries support simple and indexed queries. You can retrieve subsets of invoices by providing an indexed query and specifying the index to start from and the page size to retrieve. You can also filter invoices using their dates. lists the supported search fields. You can use the enumeration to specify filtering operations. Supported filtering operations are: greater than, greater than or equals, less than, less than or equals, equals, and not equals. You can also compose compound filters that use the AND and OR field filter operations to retrieve a specific invoice subset.
